titles.title: Ii wa, Tokubetsu ni... Sensei ga Shite Ageru / A, Atashi to... Shite... Kurenai? / Watashitachi no Ecchi na Tokoro... Ippai Misete Ageru
It`s Okay, Especially If I`m Gonna Do It for You / Would You Like.. to Do It.. with Me? / We`re Gonna Show All of Our Perverted Side for You
いいわ, 特別に... 先生がしてあげる♡ / あ, あたしと... して... くれない? / 私達のエッチなところ... いーっぱい見せてあげる♪
